Casino at Hotel X Toronto

Hotel X Toronto is one of the most luxurious hotels in Canada. The hotel offers guests new, luxurious rooms with excellent service and a wide range of amenities.

Rooms

Rooms

The rooms at Hotel X Toronto are some of the best in Canada. They personify luxury and comfort, combining modern design and stylish interiors. Each room is equipped with the latest technology and amenities, providing guests with the utmost pleasure during their stay.

  • Luxury Room
  • Signature King
  • Signature Room with 2 Queen Beds
  • Corner Studio with King Bed

Restaurants

Dine & Drink

Hotel X Toronto features some of the best dining options in Canada. Here guests can enjoy delicious dishes of various cuisines, prepared from fresh and quality ingredients. The restaurant rooms are decorated in a modern style and create an atmosphere of luxury and comfort. The hotel's chefs are known for their talent and culinary skills, which makes the dishes truly delicious and unique.

Slot room

The Slot Room at Hotel X Toronto is one of the best gambling destinations in Canada. This brand new gaming room offers guests the opportunity to enjoy exciting gaming experiences at the cutting edge of gaming. With attention to detail and comfort, the Slot Room at Hotel X Toronto offers a superheated atmosphere of excitement and entertainment. Guests can enjoy a wide selection of games and feel the thrill of victory in a unique environment where maximum attention is paid to their needs and enjoyment of the game.
